name: Young Cave Dragon
movement: walk 20 ft., fly 20 ft., burrow 40 ft.
description: The Young Cave Dragon has a robust build with spikes along its body, embodying the classic traits of dragonkind with a connection to subterranean landscapes.
memorable: Its ability to envelop the area in darkness and unleash a cone of poisonous gas makes it a significant threat.
goals: To guard its lair and eliminate adventurers who invade its territory.
relations: Might serve or be served by other creatures of the dark, such as kobolds or other evil dragons.
environment: Typically found in caves or underground lairs.
strengths: Significant hit points and strong physical attacks, alongside its unique abilities like creating darkness and burrowing.
weaknesses: Lower Dexterity and Intelligence scores compared to other dragons.
attacks: Multiattack to deliver a powerful Bite and multiple Claw strikes with additional poisonous damage.
most_powerful_ability: Poison Breath, a devastating area attack that can poison enemies and severely impact their capabilities.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet and tremorsense up to 90 feet, allowing it to detect vibrations and movement in its environment.
skills: Has high Perception, making it adept at noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Darkness Shroud ability to create nonmagical darkness.
Can burrow through earth and stone without causing disturbance.
Exceptional climbing ability with Spiked Climb.
Ruff Spikes can deter nearby enemies trying to enter its space.
test_queries: dragon that creates darkness and poison gas
large dragon with spikes and poison breath
cave dragon that intimidates nearby creatures
formidable dragon with high hit points
